EmailTemplate.subject: Summer Sale: Up to 95% off at GoDirectTrade.com
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/fire-sale.html?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=SummerSale]]> <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/fire-sale.html?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=SummerSale]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
We’re reaching out to our valued Honeywell customers to share some exciting news about a new sale at the industry’s newest and most innovative ecommerce marketplace, GoDirect Trade <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/fire-sale.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=marketo&utm_term=hat_787]]>.
Just in time for the busy air travel season, we’ve launched our SUMMER SALE with aero parts at up to 95% off! Click the button below to view parts and sign in or sign up to view pricing on every listing, so you can simply checkout online and take full advantage of this sale:
MORE THAN 4,000 PARTS AT UP TO 95% OFF <https://www.godirecttrade.com/fire-sale.html?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=SummerSale>
In addition to this exciting Summer Sale, we’re actively looking for companies interested in driving industry evolution by changing the way aero parts are bought and sold. If you’d like to create your own online storefront, we have some exciting new offers for companies that want to start selling on GoDirect Trade. Please contact Tony Perillo <[[mailto:tony.perillo@honeywell.com]]> for more information.
Happy shopping!
